short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy extension that adds a search bar to the AWS role selection page. Log in without leaving the keyboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A handy-dandy Chrome extension for navigating long AWS Role selection pages.
Adds a search field to the AWS role selection page, so your hands don't have to leave the keyboard in order to select a role. Type in a few words, and hit enter!
